name: Blockheads
description:
Blockheads is a 2D co-op platformer where the goal is to escape the mine shaft that's caving in on itself. You have to work together to make your way out by combining the unique abilities you have at your disposal! Will you avert impending doom by breaking rocks, walking on water, and shooting whatever gets in your way? Or will your abnormally big, blocky heads get in the way of your survival?

Controls:

Player 1 = WASD (Floatie)

Player 2 = IJKL (Hardhat)

Player 3 = Arrow Keys + Mouse (Gun Guy)

FEEDBACK FORM: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdVMGG2-sh7mAM6MERHJe0GORVIiiAWS-ARLE1R...

Credits: 

Programmer - Noah Lemaire

2D Artist - Ryan Pratt

Level Designer - Adam Brochu
